scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of three letters from Ellen Glasgow to J. J. Lankes, 1927-1929, regarding Lankes' woodcuts, including one he has done of her house.

did.unittitle: Ellen Glasgow, Richmond, Virginia, to J. J. Lankes, Hilton Village, Virginia. 1927 Jan 30

scopecontent.p: Writes that she is enchanted with the woodcut of her house and wishes him to sign the thin proofs.

did.unittitle: Ellen Glasgow, Richmond, Virginia, to J. J. Lankes, Hilton Village, Virginia. 1927 May 8

scopecontent.p: Regrets not being able to do an article because of ill health and says that his woodcuts make a very strong appeal to her.

did.unittitle: Ellen Glasgow, Richmond, Virginia, to J. J. Lankes, Hilton Village, Virginia. 1929 Dec 17

scopecontent.p: Introduces Roberta Wellgood, a great admirer of his woodcuts, who wishes to talk with him about his book.
